name: Bicycle Shops: Sales and Service
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell bicycles, bicycle parts, and accessories. Bicycle
shops may also sell a limited variety of related sporting apparel, and
may or may not also conduct repair work or rent bicycles.
For merchants that primarily repair bicycles, use MCC 7699.
For merchants that primarily rent bicycles, use MCC 7999.
